name: Crowne Plaza Lille

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my husband choosed this hotel by the reviews at Trip Advisor and it seemed better than our expectations.
reviews.title: Nice staff, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked very easy by email and staff there was very kind and efficient with us.
reviews.title: Handy modern chain hotel - seconds from Eurostar station - Lille

likes.liked: — The convenience for the stations and the metro/tram system

reviews.text: Location can't be better, between the two train stations, near everything. It stays over a shopping, with a big market. Close to the metro station, but we can go walking until the center, restaurants, and stores.
reviews.title: Great Location, Perfect for a quick visit

reviews.text: The room don't have a bed for a couple, so we putted the two beds together. The size of the room is very good, the kitchen is very nice and clean, the bathroom is big and clean, and has a toillet part separated from the rest, with gives to the guests a great freedom.
reviews.title: You can't miss this hotel!!

likes.liked: — Its proximity to the eurostar station
likes.disliked: — the third bed was a camp bed

reviews.text: They don't take out the garbage, so we had to do that. Ask the staff and they will tell you where to put it.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel
Fantastic!!!
reviews.text: This hotel was amazing! Rooms were very spacious, loved the bathroom. Had a minor problem with the shower but overall a beautiful room. Right opposite the station, really close to city centre. Breakfast had lots of choice and the dining room was modern and contemporary. Overall, the hotel has many facilites and we had a thoroughly enjoyable time.

We stayed at this hotel for three nights in early July after reading the reviews on Tripadvisor. The hotel is in an excellent location, right opposite the Lille Europe station and only a 10 minute walk from the centre of town. Be warned however if you are driving to the hotel (as we were) the road layout is quite difficult so get a map or some good directions before you head off.
reviews.title: Great value hotel

reviews.text: The rooms were a good size, very comfortable and well soundproofed (we heard nothing from our neighbours and virtually nothing from the dual carriageway at the back). The design was quite funky with the frosted glass wall between the bedroom and bathroom. We had no problems with the airconditioning - the room was comfortably cool despite the 30+ degrees celsius heat outside.
reviews.title: Good base for Lille
Not bad at all
reviews.text: Hotel is right outside the Eurostar train station, which is very convenient. It's also close to a massive shopping centre.
The room was very comfortable, and quite clean. I was impressed with most of the staff, and the resturant was also quite nice. Hotel seems to be mainly for business travelers though.
reviews.title: Good hotel but expensive!

reviews.text: Breakfast was a bit expensive though, at 18 euros per person, but I ended up not paying (see below).
reviews.title: Perfect for a Eurostar break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only problem with this place was that when we were checking in, the person who handled it wrongly put that we were staying for 2 nights instead of 3. I corrected him immediately, however, when we were checking out, I was still asked to pay for the 3rd night (we had booked through lastminute.com). I argued for a bit, and in the end, we were told that it was a mistake, and somewhere in all of this, they forgot to ask me to pay for breakfast.
reviews.title: very good hotel, excellent location

likes.liked: — the location to the station and town centre
likes.disliked: — the fact that breakfast was very expensive

reviews.text: All in all, it was a good trip, and I would recommend this hotel to anyone using Eurostar.
reviews.title: would stay there again

likes.liked: — location to eurostar staion - very easy for luggage but quiet hotel
likes.disliked: — lack of personal sevice at breakfast - i.e help yourself tea/coffee

reviews.text: Recently stayed for a Friday night with my wife - short weekend break.Hotel seems mostly for business travellers.
reviews.title: Convenient Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Main complaint was the cleanliness ! The carpet in our Superior Bedroom was heavily stained as was the armchair seat. Would not have wanted to sit on it !!
reviews.title: The BEST!
Great location
reviews.text: Advised Reception on checking out and was told that the manager would contact me by email. No communication received to date !
We stayed here for three nights in July and we LOVED it! Having stayed at many hotels throughout the World, my standards have become rather high, and this hotel did not dissappoint at all.

Excellent choice for seeing Lille
reviews.text: The location is excellent, right outside the Euralille Eurostar station. There is a huge Shopping Centre only moments away called Euralille which has loads of shops.

description: The Crowne Plaza Lille-Euralille hotel with its contemporary design, combines top of the range comfort and services. This 4 star hotel offers 121 bright, air conditioned and spacious tastefully decorated rooms with panoramic views.Our hotel, freshly redecorated is situated in the heart of Lille, its shopping areas, business district, and only walking distance away from the Lille Europe Eurostar train station with easy access to the main highways leading to Paris, Reims, Brussels, Dunkerque and Calais. The historical and cultural city of Lille also offers entertainment with its Zenith Arena Concert Hall, Casino, and major trade fairs at Lille Grand Palais Exhibition Centre aswell as the International World Trade Centre, which you will find adjacent to the Crowne Plaza Lille-Euralille hotel. Within the elegant surroundings of our 'Le Plaza' Restaurant, you will appreciate creative and refined French cuisine, buffet, brunch or a la carte service. The Crowne Plaza Lille-Euralille hotel offers you additional facilities including a fitness room, sauna, business centre, 5 meeting rooms and parking.Come and appreciate the famous Northern French hospitality.
